item.description:
This is the first monthly meeting of the Portland Maine Oil Awareness group. We plan to view the DVD "The End of Suburbia", discuss the pros and cons of being an official dues-paying Meetup group, and get to know each other.

Please note that since I am now the official Organizer, I'm taking on the $19/month fee for this month. Since it was only my decision and not a consensus, I'm not formally requiring an event fee for you to attend. However, if you could voluntarily contribute a few bucks to help me defray that charge, that would be great! We'll talk about whether to continue that or not.
item.name: The Portland Oil Awareness September Meetup
